snippet.title: Techtonica Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Build, automate, and optimize your own sprawling factory below the surface of an alien planet teeming with bioluminescent life. Introducing #Techtonica. Learn more at https://techtoni.ca.

=== Wishlist Techtonica on Steam ===
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1457320/Techtonica/

=== Join the Techtonica community on Discord ===
https://discord.com/invite/2FERjrU9wt

=== Learn more about Techtonica ===
https://techtoni.ca/ 

=== Find us on Social ===
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FireHoseGames 
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/Techtonica/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/firehosegames/

#Techtonica is a first-person factory building game set below the surface of an alien planet within a network of caverns teeming with bioluminescent life. Players will explore a vast network of caves beneath the surface of an alien planet as they work alone or with friends to build and optimize complex, automated factories, gather resources, establish a base of operations, and uncover the secrets buried in Techtonica.
